cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I come out during the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
😎 You can't look directly at me!
🌻 The plants need me to live

cosmos.question: I am round and I spin around the Sun. I am where we live. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🏡 You live on me!
🌱 Plants grow here.

cosmos.question: I come out at night and I shine bright, sometimes round, sometimes like a banana. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me
🌝 I sometimes look like a big circle.
🌑 Other times, you can barely see me.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light very far away, much bigger than Earth. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night.
🔥 I make my own light.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and a planet near Earth. People want to visit me! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 They send rovers to explore.
🔴 I look like a red dot in the sky.
🍫 My soil is the color of chocolate.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas with a giant red spot, and I'm the biggest planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have very big storms!
🔴 I have a big red spot that is really a storm.
🌌 I am further away from the Sun than Earth.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me. They are made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very sparkly!
🧊 My rings are made of ice and rocks!
🪐 I'm a gas giant

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: You can see me at night if it is dark and clear.
🌌 Some of them look like animals.
✨ Connect the dots of the stars

cosmos.question: I am a very hot ball of burning gas. I'm in the middle of our solar system and all the planets go around me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ We can't live without me!
🔥 I am very far from Earth
🌎 Earth goes around me

cosmos.question: I'm a path that Earth takes around the sun, it takes a whole year to finish. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 It’s not a circle!
🛣️ It's the journey around the Sun.
🗓️ It is how we measure years.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I make honey for you all. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am small and yellow and black.
🐝 I live in a hive with my family.
🍯 I help flowers make yummy food.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and I fly so high. I used to be a caterpillar. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I love to drink nectar from flowers.
🌱 I start as a little worm eating leaves.
🌈 I can be many pretty colors!

bug.question: I hop and jump with strong back legs. I make a chirping sound in the grass. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am usually green.
☀️ I like to be out in the sun in a grassy field.
🎵 I make a 'chirp chirp' noise.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I am good luck. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a small, round beetle.
🪴 Gardeners like me because I eat bad bugs.
🔴 My color is the same as an apple.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry crumbs. I live in a colony. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and strong.
🏠 I live underground with many friends.
🍕 I like to eat dropped food.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of a sticky string.
🕷️ I have more legs than you do.
🪰 I like to eat flies.

bug.question: I buzz around your head and bite. Who am I?

hints.text: 🩸 I need to drink blood.
🦟 My bite can itch a lot.
🌃 I like to come out at night.

bug.question: I light up at night, a tiny glowing spark. I twinkle in the darkness. Who am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can make my own light!
🌃 You can see me best when it's dark.
🟢 My light is sometimes green or yellow.

bug.question: I build my home from sticks and mud, near rivers and ponds. My larva is very unique to make you all say 'Aha!'. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I am an insect and build my home.
🏞️ I live near the water.
🧱 My home is not something that most animals can do.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, shaped like a twig or leaf. I wait very still for my prey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I blend in with the leaves or sticks on trees.
🌳 I am green or brown.
🦗 I am a bug, but look just like a plant.
